steps.text:
Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 28-2011. A 74-year-old 
man with pemphigus vulgaris and lung nodules.
Mylonakis E(1), Muse VV, Mino-Kenudson M.

Author information:
(1)Division of Infectious Diseases, Massachusetts General Hospital, and 
Department of Medicine, Harvard Medical School, Boston, USA.
